name: Fractured Animal Names Trivia Game | Fractured Animals | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Black Beauty.

	The book Black Beauty is by Anna Sewell.

Charlotte the spider.

	Charlotte's the loving spider in E.B. White's Charlotte's Web.

Peter Rabbit.

	Peter Rabbit is probably Beatrix Potter's most famous book.

Kanga and Baby Roo.

	They're characters in A.A. Milne's Pooh books.

questions.correct: Puss 'n Boots & Puss in Boots & Puss'n Boots
questions.explanation:
Puss 'n Boots & Puss in Boots & Puss'n Boots.

	An old fairytale. Puss brings his master fortune, fame, and a royal marriage. Don't know why he wears boots, but he does.

Felix the Cat.

	Felix the cat, the wonderful, wonderful cat! Whenever he gets in a fix, he reaches into his bag of tricks!

Mr. Toad & Mister Toad&mr toad

	The conceited but lovable owner of Toad Hall in The Wind in the Willows by Kenneth Grahame.

questions.text: A harder one: Bag Wag or Bagwag
questions.explanation:
Bigwig & Thlayli & Big Wig.

	He's a loyal member of Hazel's band of rabbits in Watership Down by Richard Adams.

questions.correct: The Three Billy Goats Gruff & The 3 Billy Goats Gruff
questions.explanation:
The Three Billy Goats Gruff & The 3 Billy Goats Gruff.

	I guess Gruff was their last name.

questions.correct: Freddy the Pig & Freddie the Pig
questions.explanation:
Freddy the Pig & Freddie the Pig.

	Sorry if you haven't read these terrific books. Freddy Goes to Florida and Freddy Goes to the North Pole are my favorites.
